ideas.title: Pebble’s founder introduces a $75 AI smart ring for recording brief notes with a press of a button
ideas.description:
After rebooting the Pebble smartwatch, founder Eric Migicovsky is expanding his company's device lineup with a new smart wearable: an AI-powered smart ring known as Index 01. Named for the finger where the ring is meant to be worn, the new $75 ring is not meant to be a competitor to the always-on, always-listening AI devices, like the AI pendant Friend, but instead offers a way to record quick notes and reminders with a press of a button on the ring's side.

AI only comes into play via the open
hooks: The $75 AI Ring That Could Change Everything
One Button, Infinite Possibilities: Meet Index 01

tips: Use cinematic B-roll of hands interacting with ring
Include founder interview with dynamic lighting and composition
Create chapter markers highlighting technical and design insights
